title: (Fri Full) Ben Rector on Texting Thomas Rhett to Be On His New Song + Brings His Guitar to Perform + Gary Levox on The Most Expensive Thing He Can Buy without Telling His Wife + His New Solo Single
itunes:title: (Fri Full) Ben Rector on Texting Thomas Rhett to Be On His New Song + Brings His Guitar to Perform + Gary Levox on The Most Expensive Thing He Can Buy without Telling His Wife + His New Solo Single
description:
Ben Rector stops by the studio to talk about his new song with Thomas Rhett, getting Snoop Dogg to rap on his song and how he had to ‘edit’ it. He brings his guitar and performs his big hit “Brand New” and some new music! Gary Levox of Rascal Flatts calls in today to talk about his new solo song “Get Down Like That” which was written by Thomas Rhett and Hardy.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
